title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry Recipe
description: A quick and flavorful stir-fry featuring tender beef strips and crisp broccoli in a savory, well-balanced sauce.

ingredients.name: Shaoxing wine or dry sherry (optional, for marinade)

steps: Marinate the beef: Mix the beef strips with the marinade ingredients (soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, Shaoxing wine, sesame oil, and baking soda) and let sit for at least 30 minutes.
Prepare the sauce: Whisk together the sauce ingredients (soy sauce, oyster sauce, honey, brown sugar, beef broth or water, cornstarch slurry, rice vinegar, and sesame oil) in a bowl and set aside.
Blanch the broccoli: Boil water and blanch the broccoli florets for 30 seconds, then transfer to ice water, drain, and set aside.
Sear the beef: Heat oil in a pan over high heat and sear the beef for 1-2 minutes per side until browned; then remove and set aside.
Sauté aromatics: In the same pan, add minced garlic and ginger, stir-frying for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Combine and cook: Add the blanched broccoli and beef back into the pan, pour in the prepared sauce, and stir well. Simmer for 1-2 minutes until the sauce thickens.
Garnish and serve: Garnish with sesame seeds and sliced green onions, and serve hot over steamed rice or noodles.
